===== In Kuwait =====
===== In Kuwait =====
â
{{Expand-section|date=April 2010}}
+
According to [[George Ishak]], The online group had planned to hold its first meeting in public to launch the [[Kuwait|Kuwaiti]] branch of the Egyptian ''National Association for Change''<ref name="Kuwait: Deportation of 17 Egyptian supporters of the Mohamed ElBaradei">[http://www.addustour.com/ViewTopic.aspx?ac=%5CArabicAndInter%5C2010%5C04%5CArabicAndInter_issue913_day11_id227618.htm Kuwait: Deportation of 17 Egyptian supporters of the Mohamed ElBaradei]</ref>.
  +   +
{{Quotation|
  +
'''"There are no Egyptian elections at the moment ... and it is unacceptable for nationals to take the internal politics of their countries to the host country"<ref name="Kuwait deports 17 pro-ElBaradei Egyptians">[http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/04/10/AR2010041003411.html Kuwait deports 17 pro-ElBaradei Egyptians]</ref>.'''|[[Rawodan Al Rawodan]]|[[State Minister for Cabinet Affairs of Kuwait|Kuwait's Minister of Cabinet Affairs]]
  +
}}
  +   +
Kuwaiti authorities deported 17 Egyptian nationals supporting potential Egyptian presidential candidate Mohamed ElBaradei in Kuwait City. They were among 33 Egyptians in Kuwait City who belonged to a pro-ElBaradei group on the social networking site Facebook and who were detained by Kuwaiti authorities.
  +   +
{{Quotation|
  +
'''"These Egyptians are here to work not to form groups"<ref name="Kuwait deports 17 pro-ElBaradei Egyptians"/>.'''|[[Rawodan Al Rawodan]]|[[State Minister for Cabinet Affairs of Kuwait|Kuwait's Minister of Cabinet Affairs]]
  +
}}
  +   +
Kuwaiti officials said Egypt's internal politics should be kept in Egypt and not exercised abroad.
  +   +
{{Quotation|
  +
'''"Kuwait does not interfere into Egypt's internal affairs"<ref name="Kuwait deports 17 pro-ElBaradei Egyptians"/>.'''|[[Rawodan Al Rawodan]]|[[State Minister for Cabinet Affairs of Kuwait|Kuwait's Minister of Cabinet Affairs]]
  +
}}
  +   +
The Egyptian political forces to staged a protest in front of the Embassy of Kuwait in Cairo <ref name="The Egyptian authority mange to aborte a demonstration condemning the arrest supporter ElBaradei in front the Embassy of Kuwait">[http://www.shorouknews.com/ContentData.aspx?id=208768 The Egyptian authority mange to aborte a demonstration condemning the arrest supporter ElBaradei in front the Embassy of Kuwait]</ref>.
  +   +
[[Gamila Ismail]], an Egyptian journalist, said the demonstration comes to protest the practices of the Kuwaiti security forces and their arrest of the Egyptians because of their ad campaign to launch the [[Kuwait|Kuwaiti]] branch of the Egyptian ''National Association for Change''.
  +   +
{{Quotation|
  +
'''"Ø§ÙÙØ¸Ø§ÙØ±Ø© Ø£ÙØ¶Ø§Ù ÙÙ ÙÙØ¹ ÙÙ Ø§ÙØ§Ø­ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¬ Ø¹ÙÙ ÙÙØ§Ø±Ø³Ø§Øª Ø£Ø¬ÙØ²Ø© Ø§ÙØ§ÙÙ Ø§ÙØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙØ© Ø¶Ø¯ Ø§ÙÙØ·Ø§ÙØ¨ÙÙ Ø¨Ø§ÙØ­Ø±ÙØ© ÙØ§ÙØ¯ÙÙÙØ±Ø§Ø·ÙØ©"''' <br />
  +
'''"Demonstration also is a form of protest against the practices of the security forces against the Arab claimants freedom and democracy"<ref name="Security prevents "The female activists for change" to meet with the Ambassador of Kuwait">[http://www.youm7.com/News.asp?NewsID=212927&SecID=65&IssueID=0 Security prevents "The female activists for change" to meet with the Ambassador of Kuwait]</ref>'''|[[Gamila Ismail]]
  +
}}
  +   +
While ElBaradei described the Egyptians deportation from Kuwait ''"'''gross injustice'''"â''<ref name="Press Review: Egyptian media denounces deportation of ElBaradei supporters by Kuwait">[http://bikyamasr.com/?p=11702 Press Review: Egyptian media denounces deportation of ElBaradei supporters by Kuwait]</ref><ref name="Egyptian back from Kuwait: Egyptian Foreign Ministry did not help us... and ElBaradei describes the migration "gross injustice"">[http://www.shorouknews.com/ContentData.aspx?id=209122 Egyptian back from Kuwait: Egyptian Foreign Ministry did not help us... and ElBaradei describes the migration "gross injustice"]</ref>.
